mapper.insert: insert into user (email, user_name, nickname, pw, auth, birth, phone, state, company, career, aboutme, sex, age, img) values (#{email},#{user_name},#{nickname},#{pw},'normal',#{birth},#{phone},'Y',#{company},#{career},#{aboutme},#{sex},#{age},#{img})
mapper.update: update user_keyword set user_no=(select last_insert_id()) where user_no=1
update user_skill set user_no=(select last_insert_id()) where user_no=1
update user_license set user_no=(select last_insert_id()) where user_no=1
